transportAdvice: The historic old town and main waterfront are very walkable, and most major tourist sites are reachable on foot from the city center. Bari has a local bus network covering the wider city, and taxis are readily available at stands near the train station and main squares.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally rainy with mild temperatures, typical of a Mediterranean winter.
Still cool with some rain, but days can be pleasantly mild and bright.
Spring begins to arrive with warming temperatures and a mix of sun and showers.
Mild and increasingly sunny, a pleasant time to explore the city and coast.
Warm and largely sunny with low rainfall, ideal for sightseeing and outdoor dining.
Hot and sunny with very little rain, perfect beach weather beginning to set in.
Peak summer heat with long sunny days and minimal rainfall, great for the beach.
The hottest month, very sunny and humid, with the sea at its warmest.
Warm and still largely sunny, with the summer crowds beginning to thin.
Comfortable autumn temperatures with increasing chances of rain but still many fine days.
Noticeably cooler and wetter, though mild compared to northern Europe.
Cool and occasionally rainy with short days, but the city has a festive atmosphere.
